meanings.definition: The process of making integrated circuits by transferring a circuit pattern onto a semiconductor wafer using light.
meanings.sent1: Photolithography is used to create tiny circuits on computer chips.
meanings.sent2: The factory uses photolithography to make the electronic components.
meanings.sent3: When the aliens tried photolithography, they accidentally made a pattern of smiley faces on the wafer.
meanings.sent4: In the world of technology, photolithography is like a magic wand that brings circuits to life.
meanings.sent5: The scientist explained photolithography as painting with light to build circuits.
